story:
One house funded.  Four to go.

Summary 

Do you support renewable energy? Do you enjoy creating positive change in our communities? If so, then you've come to the right campaign!

By supporting this campaign, you will help Nebraskans for Solar and our community partner, Habitat for Humanity of Omaha install solar hot water systems on five Habitat houses. These families, like those seen below, will then have the means to reduce their monthly energy costs by harnessing power from the sun for the next 20 to 25 years! The money they save can be spent on food, healthcare, education, and other needs, benefiting their families and communities for a very long time!

                             

These five houses will serve to raise awareness about solar technology and how it benefits people and the environment. As more communities adopt our solar power program for low-income families, or develop their own variations, a growing number of communities will benefit. Plus, every year over their combined lifetimes, these five solar systems will replace grid energy whose generation would have led to 32,000 pounds of CO2 being emitted into the atmosphere!

These solar hot water systems are compact but powerful. Each one generates about the same amount of energy per day as a 3-kilowatt solar electric system, or twelve 250-watt solar panels. They can be installed elevated (for greater year-round efficiency) or flush with the roof.

Creating positive change 

By donating to this campaign, you will help create positive change in our communities. Nebraska has tremendous potential for solar energy production, and with costs continuing to come down, a "solar revolution" isn't far away. A growing number of communities in other states are solar powering Habitat for Humanity and other low-income houses, ensuring that low-income families aren't left out. That's our major goal, too. By contributing to this campaign, you will help to finance five solar-powered, low-income houses in our state, benefiting these families and our communities for many years!

Every little bit helps, whether you make a donation or help us spread the word about this campaign! Donations are tax-deductible. All Indiegogo funds raised will be paid directly to Habitat for Humanity of Omaha. 

About our perks

We have carefully chosen eco-friendly and educational perks that support your passion for renewable energy and caring for the environment. We've included several to help you reduce your carbon footprint. Learn about renewable energy with your child or grandchild by doing one or more of the projects together from Catch the Wind, Harness the Sun, by award-winning author, Michael J. Caduto. Watch him or her have fun with the world's smallest race car while learning about solar energy. Charge your cell phone and other electronics with power from the sun! Join us for dinner in your honor, and enjoy foods from local farms. No matter which perk you choose, we hope you enjoy our gift to you!

The greatest perk of all, of course, will be seeing all five Habitat for Humanity of Omaha houses with solar hot water systems on their rooftops and knowing that the families who live there and our communities will benefit from these gifts for many years to come!

Spread the word!

We need your help to spread the word about our campaign and about solar energy in our communities. Invite your families, friends, co-workers, and neighbors to join us! Together we can solar power these five low-income houses, create models for positive change, and show that solar is a viable source of energy in every community. Find us on Facebook, and be sure to add your email to our mailing list for our updates! 

Thank you to all our contributors, for your donations and for your help in getting the word out about this campaign!

Supporting Organizations

Our campaign partners are helping us spread the word to people who support solar energy in our communities. 

Special thanks to Bank of the West for your generous contribution.

                                                  

And thank you to Bold Nebraska for your generous contribution.   

                            

Thanks also to:



We would appreciate your support on this project.

story:
From Cow Pies To POOpeas

 

OUR HISTORY

Have you ever driven down the road enjoying a leisurely drive and all of a sudden had the pleasure of experiencing the aroma of, what I call, barnyard fondue?  And then looked around to see a rather productive, cattle operation and manure piled up as high as the equipment can stack it. That distinct smell fills your nostrils with an unforgettable memory. Growing up, I also gained hundreds of those types of memories; one of which involves my grandpa. As a child I had the pleasure of getting to spend quality time with my grandpa on the family ranch learning the old fashioned values of being a good steward of the land, water preservation for the crops and good old fashioned hard work. On Sundays his favorite pastime was to go to the local coffee shop with all of the other farmers and ranchers in the area. This place was amazing! I learned that you can solve all of the world's problems and fix the political system over a cup of coffee. HA, those were the days! After listening to all of the bull / Wild West tales we would head home and drive past the local cattle feed lot. Every time without a fail he would say: "Johnny can you smell the money?"  It took 45 years of wondering what he meant by that and later, a lot of hard work but I finally figured it out.

THE CHALLENGE

Agricultural feeding operations are dealing with mounting piles of manure from 100 million cows that produce approx 10 billion pounds of raw product daily. Using eco-friendly composting methods we, all of us, can reuse one of the most treasured byproducts of the Ag industries: Organic fertilizer/compost. The all natural product lends itself to greater soil health, healthier plants, healthier food products, and better water holding capacities for the soil. It can also help reduce the need for man made synthetic fertilizers and pesticides. We know that the world has a lot of problems and we aren't going to solve them all. But today, right now, we have a better choice at least when it comes to foods we eat and the ground our children play on.

VISION

Our company Natural Nutrient Solutions has established the methodology and technology to transform this endless supply of manure into a more viable and useable product. We are proud to be leading the way to addressing the problem that the livestock and dairy producers are facing.

THE PRODUCT

Our product comes from natural ‘cowpies’ composted and then we shape it into ‘peas’.  You got it!  These little, organic granulates are our POOpeas.  POOpeas is a granulated earth friendly organic based fertilizer that is repurposed from livestock / dairy waste. This product is suitable for use on gardens, vegetables, herbs, flowers, trees, shrubs, roses, houseplants and  agricultural crops.

Our product is odorless, safe to handle by your hands, it is even safe for a child to play around and it is most certainly safe for pets and our environment. 

So, did someone say safe fertilizer?  Did someone say sustainability?  Well, we did!  We are helping stop some of the toxins that run off into our rivers and waterways.  We don’t like risking our family or pets' health and lastly who wants to eat those chemicals?  Not us!  Our mission is to raise awareness for healthier living throughout the country by providing a safe alternative for all of us including our Mother Earth and even those cows that feed off it.  Not only do we strive to help build more sustainable gardens,farms but a healthier food chain overall so that we can all live healthier lives on this beautiful planet of ours.

THE RESULTS

"Last year after using POOpeas we had the most fruit on our tomato plants that we ever had in 34 years of gardening."  Doug Sato, Boise ID, Avid skier / Gardner

Doug was kind enough to send us a picture of his thriving tomato plants too. 

And take a look at what John Dodson, Assistant Professor, Horticulture Technology Program at the College of Western Idaho had to say:

“I first became aware of Poo Peas organic soil amendment in 2010 and have used it in informal trials in varying landscape and garden plantings representing varying soil types and irrigation methods.

In the 36 years of my professional involvement in the Horticulture industry I have seen, used, and tested a LOT of different organic soil amendments: manures; washed manures; bedding and manure combinations; composts; and municipal sludge and wastes, to name a few. 

One product stands out head and shoulders above the others, and that product is Poo Peas.  I have done repeated salinity ( ECe) testing from different Poo Pea bags and have found salinity levels from both short and long term saturated extracts to be ideal, in the .9 to 1.8 ECe range.  This represents ideal levels of soluble nutrients along with the longer-term organic matter content of Poo Peas.  The salinity level of an amendment is a very big deal, as the high salt levels typical of manures and certain composts have contributed to innumerable cases of root damage and plant injury and death.  The salinity level of your ‘average’ manure / compost product can range from an ECE of 6 all the way to an ECe of 25.  It is general knowledge within the field of Horticulture that an ECe of higher than 5 is considered salt-toxic to the roots of most plant species. 

An ECe between 1.0 and 2.0 is considered ideal for most plants, and Poo Peas is right in the sweet spot, between .9 and 1.8.  You could not engineer a better salinity level even using synthetic inorganic fertilizers, which of course do not provide the microbes and organic matter.

The terminology I am using may seem too technical or academic for some, but there is nothing academic or overly technical about losing crops and landscapes to manures and composts with toxic salt levels.  Root damage due to high salts comes on very quick, mimics drought stress, and often has done the damage before anyone realizes what has happened.

I can without hesitation recommend Poo Peas to professionals and home gardeners alike for safe, superior results for both immediate nutrition and the long term, necessary benefits of organic soil amendments.  Additionally, the pelletized form of the product makes it very user friendly and easy to apply in accurate amounts for pre-plant soil mix’s or post-plant gardens and landscapes.

This is a personal not official endorsement from the College of Western Idaho. I have no ownership or affiliation with the manufacturer of Poo Peas.”

FUNDING USES

We seek you're help in raising these funds so that we can continue fulfilling our mission of promoting sustainability and healthy living.  We will use the raised funds to:

    1. Upgrade plant equipment to handle larger volumes of orders.

    2. Start our national marketing campaign.

    3. Purchase new packaging equipment for the 3 lb bags.

    4 Any additional funds will be used for new product line introductions.

ONE CHOICE THE RIGHT CHOICE

We all have a choice!  Poopeas is not just a product it’s something much bigger. Poopeas is a cause that requires people to believe in a greater purpose of the product and what it accomplishes. Spread some Poopeas organic pelletized manure compost. It’s natural, organic and doesn’t smell, and it does work. Help by becoming part of the solution not being part of the problem.

Thanks for all your help

Farmer John

story:
Green Liberal Democrats

We need to take a stand on the environment!

  • Lib-Dems need to raise funds to prepare a path to a Zero-Carbon Britain
  • We need to get the message across to members, the media and the electorate
  • Please spread the word in your local party,
  • Please give us what you can spare

    visit The Green Liberal Democrats website for more https://greenlibdems.org.uk/zerocarbon
  • We don't get funding from big business or trade unions

story:
Hey! I'm Misty from MyFreeCams

I find myself in a bit of a pickle and I'm behind in my rent, I'm usually really responsible and have money saved up for this sort of thing but you see that fund has run dry due to the fact I've just had to use it all.

I need $500 & You get Goodies!!!

basically I need at least $350 to cover my rent completely up to date and I'm hopeful you guys can give me the extra $150 so I can put it away in the bank for if this ever happens again. :)
I'm going to be doing loads of Goodies & Prizes for all the people that help me with this, no matter how small. Also if we can make the Goal I will be doing other Funds for things like better photography equipment.

story:
Who We Are, and What We Aim to Achieve

This project is led by Bernice Tadique and Saumitra Kelkar, 11th grade students at Whitney High School. We aim to renovate the garden by the South Gate of the school with the help of Whitney's Key Club in order to beautify the campus, attract native species of hummingbirds and butterflies, and pay homage to Whitney High School's deceased educators. In order to carry out this project, we need to raise $1,100 in funds. The project will not be possible without your help.

What We Need

The garden will be home to multiple species of plants, such as columbines, sages, and honeysuckles. The plants have been estimated by a local nursery to cost about $470 in total, but because plant prices vary depending on season and availability we have decided to budget $500 for plants. Because the soil in the plot has been depleted of nutrients over the years, we will also be adding fifteen bags of compost, which cost $10 each, and two bags of other organic fertilizers, which cost $20 for each bag, to fortify the soil with micronutrients. We have budgeted $200 for soil amendments We also plan to mount a plaque on the back wall of the garden to commemorate Whitney High School's deceased educators. This plaque will cost about $150. We have allotted $150 more in our total budget that will be used for maintenance such as replacing dead plants, adding more fertilizer, and managing disease or pest outbreaks. If our fundraising goal is not met, we will amend our original budget plan by planting more plants from seed, choosing cheaper plant species, and planting fewer plants. We will attempt to successfully complete the garden with whatever funds we do raise. If our fundraising goal is met or exceeded, excess funds will be donated to Whitney High School's Key Club.

The Impact

The garden will, aside from adding beauty to Whitney High School's campus, will be home to many butterfly and hummingbird attracting species of flowering plants, such as milkweeds, buddleias, and salvias. The garden's plants will include hosts for the caterpillars of a handful of species of butterflies, including monarch butterflies. The flowers will also attract dozens of other species of butterflies and many species of hummingbirds native to Southern California. Some of the larger shrubs in the garden will provide possible nesting sites for hummingbirds. The garden will also be very environmentally friendly to maintain. It will be watered with reclaimed water and the soil will be covered with a layer of mulch to retain water. Many of the plant species in it are natives of the Southwest. Almost all are drought tolerant. All methods of pest and disease control will be 100% environmentally friendly and all fertilizers and soil amendments will be organic. Many of these soil amendments, such as blood meal, bone meal, and coffee grounds from local coffee shops, are byproducts of other industries and would have otherwise ended up in a landfill. The mulch will consist of shredded trees from local landscaping companies, and, like the soil amendments, would have otherwise been dumped in a landfill. The mulch will slowly decompose and provide nutrients for the growing plants, and will, in addition to trapping water in the soil, help keep the soil from becoming too warm on hot days, further reducing the amount of water needed by the plants. Students will have the opportunity to observe a plethora of different species of plants and animals living and interacting in the garden, which could possibly foster an interest in biology and related sciences.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute to this campaign yourself, you can still help by spreading the word. Awareness and publicity are essential to attracting more contributors.

story:
(Información en Español abajo)

Who are we?

A Todo Pulmón Paraguay Respira (ATP) is an environmentally-focused non-profit non-governmental organization based in the capital of Paraguay, in South America, since 2009. Our organization focuses on reforestation and forestation initiatives, providing native tree donations and technical support. We also emphasize environmental education and raising awareness alongside our work in the field.


Why do we need a Tree Nursery?

A well-designed Tree Nursery & Education Center embodies the main objectives of ATP: forestation efforts and environmental education.  We currently have a small tree nursery in Asunción, the capital of Paraguay, that is in desperate need of renovation.  With several important changes in design, the new tree nursery will be much better able to serve its function as a source of healthy native trees for local planting initiatives, as well as a center to which we can bring children and young adults for environmental education workshops.

With your help, we can create a green space where our children can come to escape the city and gain an appreciation for nature.  We plan to hold frequent hands-on workshops to teach youth (and adults, too!) about different native tree species, how to plant a tree, and why trees are so amazing and useful in supporting life.

 

How can YOU help, and how will we show our appreciation?

In order to complete the architect-designed renovations on our tree nursery that will protect the tree saplings from frequent flooding, strong winds, and create an open and inviting space for youth to experience nature hands-on, we need to raise $5500.

We appreciate any contribution you can make, however small. In an effort to show our appreciation, we'd like to offer several different levels of perks to our contributors.  Your generous donation will be remembered for the long life of a tree, or several.  You can see all perks details listed on the right of the page.

We know that not everyone can contribute through monetary support, but there are other ways we can use your help!  Please "like" our page on Facebook: A Todo Pulmón Paraguay Respira, and help spread the word about our campaign!

Thank you!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Vivero Forestal y Centro Educativo

En A Todo Pulmón deseamos renovar nuestro vivero de árboles forestales con la intención de habilitarlo como un vivero escuela, con enfoque especial en la educación ambiental de niños.

¿Quiénes somos?

A Todo Pulmón Paraguay Respira (ATP) es una asociación civil sin fines de lucro con el objetivo principal de recuperar 1.000.000 ha. (un millón de hectáreas) de bosques en suelo Paraguay, promoviendo el cuidado de los mismos.

ATP gerencia la implementación de programas y proyectos que promuevan la reforestación, protección y conservación de los bosques nativos. También implementa proyectos arborización en zonas urbanas y rurales, y fomenta actividades educativas para crear una conciencia sobre la importancia de preservar los recursos naturales del Paraguay.

¿Por qué necesitamos un Vivero Forestal?

Un Vivero Forestal y Centro Educativo bien elaborado personifica los objetivos principales de ATP: promoción de arborización y reforestación y educación ambiental. Hoy en día tenemos un vivero pequeño en Asunción, Paraguay, que necesita urgentemente de mejoras. Después de algunos cambios claves en su diseño, el vivero nuevo será mucho más eficaz en su función para producir y almacenar árboles nativos para iniciativas locales de plantación, así como un lugar donde podremos desarrollar talleres prácticos de educación ambiental.

Con tu apoyo, podemos crear un espacio único en la capital del Paraguay para que nuestros hijos puedan conocer más sobre la naturaleza y aumente el interés por el cuidado de nuestra tierra. Planeamos dar talleres prácticos frecuentes para enseñar no solo a niños, sino a la ciudadanía en general, sobre las diferentes especies de árboles nativos, como plantar un árbol, y sobre el porqué los árboles son tan maravillosos y útiles en sustentar nuestras vidas.

¿Cómo puedes ayudar TÚ, y como mostraremos nuestro agradecimiento?

Las mejoras de nuestro vivero fueron diseñadas por arquitectos con el fin de proteger los arbolitos de las inundaciones frecuentes, vientos fuertes, y crear un espacio abierto para que los jóvenes puedan experimentar la naturaleza de una manera práctica. Estas mejoras serán financiadas ya por fondos existentes de generosas empresas, no obstante necesitaremos recaudar $5500 para completar la construcción.

Agradecemos cualquier donación que puedas contribuir a nuestra campaña, no importa el monto.  Con la intención de mostrar nuestro agradecimiento, queremos ofrecer varios niveles de apreciación a nuestros donantes.  Tu donación generosa será recordada por la duración de la vida de un árbol, o varios de ellos. Puedes mirar la lista de niveles de apreciación al lado derecho de la página.

Sabemos que no todos pueden contribuir financieramente, pero hay otras maneras en las que nos puedes apoyar. ¡Por favor dale “me gusta” en nuestra página en Facebook: A Todo Pulmón Paraguay, y hace correr la voz sobre nuestra campaña!

¡Gracias!
story_txt:
(Información en Español abajo)Who are we?A Todo Pulmón Paraguay Respira (ATP) is an environmentally-focused non-profit non-governmental organization based in the capital of Paraguay, in South America, since 2009. Our organization focuses on reforestation and forestation initiatives, providing native tree donations and technical support. We also emphasize environmental education and raising awareness alongside our work in the field.Why do we need a Tree Nursery?A well-designed Tree Nursery & Education Center embodies the main objectives of ATP: forestation efforts and environmental education.  We currently have a small tree nursery in Asunción, the capital of Paraguay, that is in desperate need of renovation.  With several important changes in design, the new tree nursery will be much better able to serve its function as a source of healthy native trees for local planting initiatives, as well as a center to which we can bring children and young adults for environmental education workshops.With your help, we can create a green space where our children can come to escape the city and gain an appreciation for nature.  We plan to hold frequent hands-on workshops to teach youth (and adults, too!) about different native tree species, how to plant a tree, and why trees are so amazing and useful in supporting life. How can YOU help, and how will we show our appreciation?In order to complete the architect-designed renovations on our tree nursery that will protect the tree saplings from frequent flooding, strong winds, and create an open and inviting space for youth to experience nature hands-on, we need to raise $5500.We appreciate any contribution you can make, however small. In an effort to show our appreciation, we'd like to offer several different levels of perks to our contributors.  Your generous donation will be remembered for the long life of a tree, or several.  You can see all perks details listed on the right of the page.We know that not everyone can contribute through monetary support, but there are other ways we can use your help!  Please "like" our page on Facebook: A Todo Pulmón Paraguay Respira, and help spread the word about our campaign!Thank you!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Vivero Forestal y Centro EducativoEn A Todo

story:
Summary

We need a water fountain that makes a dfifference.  In our effort to be environmentally friendly to cut down on the use of water bottles, a refill station located in our Commons area will actually eliminate the use of up to 19,200 PET plastic water bottles every single year.  We need at least $950 in order to get the new fountain ordered and delivered to our Commons. #funddulac

JUST A DONATION OF ONE DOLLAR SHOWS YOU CARE!

What We Need & What You Get

We need to cut down on plastic use. Find out why here at this site-

http://5gyres.org
The Impact

We want to make more than a one year impact.  This is a change that you, our s Water bottles create about 55 billion waste bottles globally EVERY year.  We can do something now, and immediately, making a statement about "Almost half of all our plastic doesn’t find its way to a recycling plant or a landfill. Instead it joins the waterborne trash heap that is killing albatrosses and other wildlife: the Great Pacific Garbage Patch. If it weren’t in the water it would be the largest landfill in the world. The things people drop on the ground get washed down sewers and through waterways into the ocean, where they are drawn into one of the garbage vortexes (the Great Pacific isn’t the only one)."

http://www.care2.com/causes/what-really-happens-to-the-plastic-you-recycle.html

Other Ways You Can Help

All funds will go towards the donation of a water fountain bottle filling station to be installed on Campus.  We have to get a good portion of our goal, in order to make the campaign continue into the next year.  We will eventually replace all of the fountains on campus and we will map them on the app-http://wetap.org/

You can also just visit the site, share it wiht your friends, and ask them to do the same!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ZFc3VDyX9s&feature=youtu.be

story:
You Can Make A Difference In Your World

For millennia resplendent quetzals and three wattled bellbirds have lived primarily off of the fruit of wild avocado trees in Costa Rica. They have evolved a relationship with the trees that benefits both the birds and the trees.

Over the past few decades the trees they depend on for food have been vanishing from the landscape at an alarming rate, cut down to make way for agriculture, housing, and recreation.

Now these birds are endangered and without their food source these birds will vanish from the earth.

Resplendent quetzals are widely thought of as the most beautiful bird in our hemisphere, and the three wattled bird has the loudest call of any bird on earth, perfect for penetrating the foliage of the tropical forests they call home.

There is an ongoing effort to reforest the trees that these birds depend on for food.

So far over 150,000 trees have been planted at higher elevations in the Monteverde region by The Costa Rican Conservation Foundation, and the University of Georgia Costa Rica. This is the primary habitat of the resplendent quetzal and the breeding area for the three wattled bellbird.

Like Rungs On A Ladder

However, the three wattled bellbird migrates to different elevations over the course of the year. At lower elevations much of the land has been developed and the trees have been cut.

If we can plant trees all along its migration route, the bellbirds can use them to go up and down the slopes, like using the rungs on a ladder.

We need your help to establish a tree nursery at mid elevation on the Pacific slope in Costa Rica at Guacimal. If we can raise $5,000 we can establish a nursery there and begin replanting at mid elevations.

Hopefully, a nursery and tree planting program will follow down near sea level in the coastal plain.

On behalf of the quetzals and bellbirds, thank you so much for your time and your support!

Costa Rica Avocado Ladder Project

https://www.facebook.com/avocadoladderproject?ref=hl

story:
ENGLISH TEXT BELOW

О НАС И О ГОНКЕ

Нас зовут Петр и Олеся, мы живем и работаем в Москве. Олеся - психолог, телесно-ориентированный терапевт, работает со взрослыми людьми и подростками, рисует. Петр - тоже психолог, еще программист и художник. Но больше всего на свете мы любим путешествовать, а в этом году мы слегка сошли с ума и решили поучаствовать в Монгольском Ралли (Mongol Rally).

Mongol Rally - это безумная международная гонка без точного маршрута и победителей, которая проводится каждое лето и в которой люди едут через всю Европу и половину Азии на малолитражных старых автомобилях - двигатель должен быть не больше 1.0 литра и лучше, чтобы машина вообще была старой развалюхой. Так лучше ощущается дух авантюризма. На все это приключение дается два месяца и задача - вообще доехать до финиша, по статистике доезжает только 75% участников. А еще, каждая команда собирает деньги на благотворительность - и мы не исключение.

У нас большой опыт путешествий по самым разным странам - от Австрии, США и Италии до Индии, Непала и Мьянмы, от поездок по роскошным автобанам до автономных походов с рюкзаком за плечами по горам. Мы забирались на потухшие вулканы в Новой Зеландии, стопили машины в Грузии и катались на крышах автобусов в Непале. Петр водит мотоцикл, объехал половину Индии с рюкзаком, а Олеся проехала половину России на своей машине. В этом году мы решили объединить весь свой  опыт и попытаться добраться до Монголии на маленьком желтом Daewoo Matiz.

Гонка стартует 15 июля в Праге, большая часть пути проходит по Монголии, а заканчивается это все в Улан-Удэ. Мы уже вовсю готовимся к ралли, чиним машину и подготавливаем снаряжение.

Наша команда называется Mama Was Right (мама была права). Ну, вы понимаете, мама была права, кругом опасно.

НА ЧТО МЫ СОБИРАЕМ ДЕНЬГИ

Чтобы у этой гонки был общественный смысл - команды собирают деньги на благотворительные цели. Рекомендуемая организаторами сумма сбора - £1000. Мы хотим собрать с вашей помощью деньги и распределить их следующим образом:

  • во-первых, это общественная организация Cool Earth, которая занимается сохранением лесов на планете. Это условие - часть требований организаторов Mongol Rally. Мы планируем направить в этот фонд £500 (это примерно $700)
  • во-вторых, мы хотим помочь одной московской школе, в которой учатся дети с аутизмом. Это школа имени Святого Георгия, она не получает должного финансирования от государства и большая часть затрат ложится на плечи родителей детей, которые там учатся.  Аутизм или расстройство аутистического спектра это сложное состояние, при котором человеку становится сложно коммуницировать с окружающими его людьми, снижаются способности социального взаимодействия, при этом эти люди не являются больными. Они - другие. Часто - очень талантливые в определенных сферах жизни. Но им сложно находиться в социуме и особенно сложно приходится родителям таких детей. И здесь любая финансовая помощь может очень помочь.

МАРШРУТ И ДАТЫ

(Маршрут на картинке примерный. Возможно, мы еще попробуем попасть в Туркменистан, сейчас пытаемся сделать визы.)

  • 10го июля мы стартуем из Москвы и двигаемся в Прагу
  • 15го июля все команды старт ралли в Праге
  • дальше мы планируем пересечь такие страны как Чехия, Словакия, Венгрия, Хорватия, Босния и Герцеговина, Черногория, Сербия, Болгария, Турция и Грузия.
  • дальше у нас есть выбор - отправиться из Грузии в Россию и попасть в Казахстан. Либо, что интересней, сесть на паром в Баку (Азербайджан) и попасть в Казахстан на нем, пересечь при этом Каспийское море. Или же сесть на паром в Баку и попасть в Туркменбаши (Туркменистан)
  • дальше мы двигаемся в Узбекистан, Таджикистан, где мы планируем проехать Памирский тракт, Киргизию, снова попасть в Казахстан, подняться на север, пересечь границу с Россией, доехать до Монголии, посетить Улан-Батор и финишировать в Улан-Удэ, в родной России
  • финишировать хотим до 1го сентября, но кто знает..
  • из Улан-Удэ мы планируем вернуться на машине в Москву

ЧТО МОЖЕТ ПОЙТИ НЕ ТАК?

В общем, все что угодно. =) В этом то и состоит приключение! Но мы не будем унывать и будем публиковать красивые фотографии в Instagram и Facebook.

Наш дорожный инстаграм тут: https://www.instagram.com/yourmamawasright

Страница на фейсбуке тут: https://www.facebook.com/mamawasright

ABOUT US AND RALLY

We are two psychologists from Moscow - Petr and Olesya. Olesya is a body-oriented psychotherapist, works with children and adult people. Petr is a software developer, psychologist and a painter. We like to travel more than anything other in this life. This year we went crazy a little bit and decided to participate in Mongol Rally.

Mongol Rally is a crazy annual race on small dumb cars with an engine with size of 1.0L or even less. During this race people go on their old cars through Europe and Asia trying to reach wonderful Mongolia. There are no strict rules and routes in this rally - the main purpose is to reach finish line. This is an adventure. And every team raises some money for charity.

We have a great travel experience - from USA, Austria and Italy to India, Nepal and Myanmar, from gorgeous German highways to several weeks tracks in some forests and mountains with a backpack with all equipment behind our backs. We have visited volcanos in New Zealand, hitchhiked cars in Georgia country and traveled in Nepal on bus roofs. Petr drives a motorbike and has been all around India with his backpack and Olesya has driven her car all around Russia. We decided to use all our travel experience to successfully reach Mongolia in this rally and already bought an old yellow small Daewoo Matiz with 0.8L engine. It is a very small (originally - Korean) car, nowadays it is produced in Uzbekistan. It is very popular in Moscow among pizza delivery service, because it's very simple, small and solid. 

Official rally start is in Prague, 15th of July, the every team goes to Mongolia, finish line is in Ulan-Ude city, Russia. We've got about 2 months to complete the race.

Our team name is "Mama Was Right". You know, mama was right, the world is dangerous all around.

ABOUT MONEY

To make sense for this crazy rally every team raises some money for charity. Recommended amount of money is £1000. We want to raise money with all your kindly help and to spread them in that ways:

  • first part we will give to social organisation Cool Earth, it is an official charity partner of the rally, so we are planning to give them £500 (about $700)
  • second part we want to send to one special Moscow school (Saint George School), there are children with autism studying there. Autism is a very complicated condition of

    consciousness and mind, we don't like to call it decease, because this children are not ill, they are..different. And they have a lot of problems with communication with other people. And all their parents go through hard periods of their lives, because it is not so easy to have an autistic kid. This Moscow school doesn't receive sufficient amount of money from government so most of the spendings are on parents of these children. So, any amount of money would be very helpful for them

THE ROUTE AND DATES

(this route is not 100% correct, we are still thinking about some parts, probably we will try to go to Turkmenistan, now we are trying to get visas there)

There is no such a thing as 'the route' in this rally, but our plan is:

  • 10th of July we leave Moscow and go to Prague
  • 15th of July - official start in Prague
  • then we want to cross these countries - Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Croatia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Montenegro, Serbia, Bulgaria and Turkey.
  • then we have two choices - enter Georgia, the enter Russia and reach Kazakhstan. Or, after Georgia we could go to Azerbaijan, take a ferry there, cross Caspian Sea  and again reach Kazakhstan. Or - take a ferry from Baku and reach Turkmenbashi city (Turkmenistan)
  • after Kazakhstan we want to go to Uzbekistan, the Tajikistan, cross Pamir Highway (4655m above the sea!!) to Kyrgyzstan, then go to north - to Kazakhstan and Russia, then finally reach Mongolia, visit Ulan-Bator and finally go north to finish line in Ulan-Ude (Russia).
  • after all of this adventure we are planning to drive back our car to Moscow

WHAT POSSIBLY COULD GO WRONG

Mm..anything? But this is an adventure and we are not planning to give up in any case. All the way we will make photos and videos about our trip on Instagram and Facebook

Our road Instagram is here: https://www.instagram.com/yourmamawasright

And our Facebook page is here: https://www.facebook.com/mamawasright

 

PERKS / Волшебные подарки

$5 Charity Perk

Эти  волшебные 5 баксов мы отложим на благотворительность. Упомянем тебя в нашем посте в инстаграм, чтобы все знали имя героя.

This glorious 5 dollars  we will send directly to charity. And also we will mention you in our post on Instagram for everybody to know the hero.

 

$5 God Help Us

А эти волшебные 5 баксов мы отложим себе на бензин. Упомянем тебя в нашем посте в инстаграм, чтобы все знали имя героя.

This 5 dollars we'll keep for our gas on a road. And also we will mention you in our post on Instagram for everybody to know the hero.

 

$10 Mongol Postcard

Специально для ралли мы нарисуем тематические монгольские открытки со смыслом и без, напечатаем их и будем отправлять их со всякими пожеланиями из разных точек нашего пути. Не забудь прислать нам свой полный почтовый адрес!

We will draw special Mongolian postcards and send them from different points of our route. Don't forget to write us your full address.

 

$20 Specail Postcard

Пришли нам свои пожелания и мы нарисуем специальную космическую открытку под тебя с Монгольской тематикой. Выложим ее в инстаграме с твоим упоминанием. И пришлем ее тебе, разумеется. Не забудь указать свой полный адрес.

Send us your wishes or desires and we will draw a special cosmic postcard only for you with some Mongolia in it. Post on Instagram with it and mention of you included. And, of course, we will send it to you. Don't forget to send your full address.

 

$30 Go With Us

Ты можешь поехать с нами! В некотором смысле. Мы разрисуем свою машину именами участников, чтобы ваши имена проехали с нами через пустыню. У нас есть талантливый друг иллюстратор, который сделает это красиво. А еще пришлем тебе открытку. Укажи нам свой почтовый адрес.

You can go with us in a some sense. We will draw our car with backers names, so your name could drive with us through the desert. We have a talented friend who can make it very beautiful. And also we will send a postcard to you, so don't forget to send us you postal address.

 

$35 Mystical Present

Мы будем заезжать во всякие интересные места, на рынки и барахолки, найдем что-нибудь необычное и отправим тебе. Только это будет не очень большой предмет. Не забудь прислать нам свой почтовый адрес. Открытку тоже пришлем.

We will visit some interesting places, markets and flea markets, will find something interesting for you and send it to you. But keep in mind, that it would be some small thing. And also we will send a postcard to you. Do not forget to send us your postal address, please. 

 

$35 Magic Sand of Mongolia

Когда мы доберемся до Монголии, то соберем тебе магического песка этого места, положим его в красивый бутылек и отправим тебе. У тебя дома будет настоящий кусочек Монголии, заряженный нашей любовью и приключениями. Не забудь указать нам свой почтовый адрес. Этот перк мы отправим, скорее всего, уже из России, в сентябре, так будет дешевле для всех (открытку пошлем в пути).

When we reach Mongolia we will take some magic Mongolian sand, put it in some little bottle and send it to you. You will have a little piece of Mongolia at your home. This perk we probably will send from Russia, in September - it would be cheaper (a postcard will be send on a way). Don't forget to send us you postal address, please.

 

$40 Hero Spare Part

Возьмем кусок нашего Матиза и превратим эту боевую часть, прошедшую огонь и воды в какой-нибудь интересный арт-объект. Мы еще сами не знаем, что это будет, но будет интересно. А потом отправим его тебе. Этот перк мы тоже, скорее всего, отправим уже из России, в сентябре - так будет дешевле и нам будет нужно время, чтобы создать немного искусства в спокойных условиях. Не забудь прислать нам свой почтовый адрес.

We will take some hero spare part of our car and turn it to some piece of art. And the will send it to you. This perk we probably send from Russia in September - it would be cheaper and we will need some time to create some art in some calm quiet place. Do not forget to send us you postal address, please.

 

$50 Shaman Ritual for Wish

Если у тебя есть какое-то желание мы попросим Вселенную исполнить его. Пришли его нам в личку и мы проведем специальный ритуал. Напишем его на бумаге, сожжем и развеем пепел по пустыне. Там. посреди пустыни, где нет людей - космос подходит очень близко к земле и обязательно тебя услышит.  Здесь надо упомянуть, что помимо психологии, мы немного знаем о мистическом устройстве нашего мира, так что вложим все наши усилия, чтобы все получилось. Заснимем этот процесс на видео, если хочешь и выложим его в Инстаграм. Или пришлем его тебе лично.

If you have some wish we will ask the Universe to make it true. Send it us in personal message and we will make some special mystical ritual for you, we will write you message on a paper, burn it and disperse the ash around. Here, in a desert, where is no people - the Space is very close to Earth and it will hear you definitely. We need to mention, that we know not only a psychology but some mystical nature of our world too, so we will make all affords for everything comes true. We will make some video for that and upload it if you want on Instagram or send it to you personally.

 

$75 Drone Greeting

Запишем для тебя крутое поздравление или желание, выложим этот текст большими буквами в пустыне и снимем крутой видос с высоты птичьего полета. Такого нет ни у кого, а у тебя будет. Пришли нам свои пожелания в личку. А еще пришлем открытку и выложим этот крутой видос у себя с твоим упоминанием, короче, полный комплект. Для открытки пришли свой почтовый адрес.

We will make a cool drone video with a greeting for you or your friend. We will make some big letters in a desert and make a video from a bird's eye view. Nobody has some cool greeting, only you. Send us you wishes in a direct message. And also we will send a postcard to you and make some Instagram post. Full package. Send us your postal address, please.

 

$100 Therapy session in Moscow

ТОЛЬКО ДЛЯ МОСКВЫ. Терапевтическая сессия у Олеси. Мы работаем в парадигме телесно-ориентированного подхода. Если у тебя есть какой-то вопрос, который ты не можешь решить или ты хочешь познакомиться с такими вещами поближе, Олеся может провести для тебя сессию в Москве, а дальше ты уже сам решишь, нужно ли тебе это в жизни или нет.

ONLY FOR MOSCOW. Therapy session with Olesya. We work in body-oriented therapy. If you have some question, that you cannot solve or you just want to understand  what a body therapy is Olesya can make a session for you in Moscow. 

 

$2000 OUR GLORIOUS CAR

ТОЛЬКО ДЛЯ РОССИИ. Отдадим тебе нашу боевую тачку. Ну или то, что от нее останется потом. В общем, это перк для самых смелых. Мы и сами не знаем, что будет в конце пути. Ну и насыпем подарков, вроде открыток, мистического песка из Монголии и прочего. Полный комплект.

ONLY FOR RUSSIA. We will gift you our car after adventure. Or the rest of it. Well, we don't know exactly yet what will gonna happen at the end, so this perk is for brave enough heroes And of course will give other presents like postcards and mystic sand.
story_txt:
ENGLISH TEXT BELOW
О НАС И О ГОНКЕ
Нас зовут Петр и Олеся, мы живем и работаем в Москве. Олеся - психолог, телесно-ориентированный терапевт, работает со взрослыми людьми и подростками, рисует. Петр - тоже психолог, еще программист и художник. Но больше всего на свете мы любим путешествовать, а в этом году мы слегка сошли с ума и решили поучаствовать в Монгольском Ралли (Mongol Rally).
Mongol Rally - это безумная международная гонка без точного маршрута и победителей, которая проводится каждое лето и в которой люди едут через всю Европу и половину Азии на малолитражных старых автомобилях - двигатель должен быть не больше 1.0 литра и лучше, чтобы машина вообще была старой развалюхой. Так лучше ощущается дух авантюризма. На все это приключение дается два месяца и задача - вообще доехать до финиша, по статистике доезжает только 75% участников. А еще, каждая команда собирает деньги на благотворительность - и мы не исключение.

У нас большой опыт путешествий по самым разным странам - от Австрии, США и Италии до Индии, Непала и Мьянмы, от поездок по роскошным автобанам до автономных походов с рюкзаком за плечами по горам. Мы забирались на потухшие вулканы в Новой Зеландии, стопили машины в Грузии и катались на крышах автобусов в Непале. Петр водит мотоцикл, объехал половину Индии с рюкзаком, а Олеся проехала половину России на своей машине. В этом году мы решили объединить весь свой  опыт и попытаться добраться до Монголии на маленьком желтом Daewoo Matiz.
Гонка стартует 15 июля в Праге, большая часть пути проходит по Монголии, а заканчивается это все в Улан-Удэ. Мы уже вовсю готовимся к ралли, чиним машину и подготавливаем снаряжение.
Наша команда называется Mama Was Right (мама была права). Ну, вы понимаете, мама была права, кругом опасно.

НА ЧТО МЫ СОБИРАЕМ ДЕНЬГИ
Чтобы у этой гонки был общественный смысл - команды собирают деньги на благотворительные цели. Рекомендуемая организаторами сумма сбора - £1000. Мы хотим собрать с вашей помощью деньги и распределить их следующим образом:

во-первых, это общественная организация Cool Earth, которая занимается сохранением лесов на планете. Это условие - часть требований организаторов Mongol Rally. Мы планируем направить в этот фонд £500 (это примерно $700)
во-вторых, мы хотим помочь одной московской школе, в которой учатся дети с аутизмом. Это школа имени Святого Георгия, она не получает должного финансирования от государства и большая часть затрат ложится на плечи родителей детей, которые там учатся.  Аутизм или расстройство аутистического спектра это сложное состояние, при котором человеку становится сложно коммуницировать с окружающими его людьми, снижаются способности социального взаимодействия, при этом эти люди не являются больными. Они - другие. Часто - очень талантливые в определенных сферах жизни. Но им сложно находиться в социуме и особенно сложно приходится родителям таких детей. И здесь любая финансовая помощь может очень помочь.


МАРШРУТ И ДАТЫ

(Маршрут на картинке примерный. Возможно, мы еще попробуем попасть в Туркменистан, сейчас пытаемся сделать визы.)

10го июля мы стартуем из Москвы и двигаемся в Прагу
15го июля все команды старт ралли в Праге
дальше мы планируем пересечь такие страны как Чехия, Словакия, Венгрия, Хорватия, Босния и Герцеговина, Черногория, Сербия, Болгария, Турция и Грузия.
дальше у нас есть выбор - отправиться из Грузии в Россию и попасть в Казахстан. Либо, что интересней, сесть на паром в Баку (Азербайджан) и попасть в Казахстан на нем, пересечь при этом Каспийское море. Или же сесть на паром в Баку и попасть в Туркменбаши (Туркменистан)
дальше мы двигаемся в Узбекистан, Таджикистан, где мы планируем проехать Памирский тракт, Киргизию, снова попасть в Казахстан, подняться на север, пересечь границу с Россией, доехать до Монголии, посетить Улан-Батор и финишировать в Улан-Удэ, в родной России
финишировать хотим до 1го сентября, но кто знает..
из Улан-Удэ мы планируем вернуться на машине в Москву

ЧТО МОЖЕТ ПОЙТИ НЕ ТАК?
В общем, все что угодно. =) В этом то и состоит приключение! Но мы не будем унывать и будем публиковать красивые фотографии в Instagram и Facebook.
Наш дорожный инстаграм тут: https://www.instagram.com/yourmamawasright
Страница на фейсбуке тут: https://www.facebook.com/mamawasright
ABOUT US AND RALLY
We are two psychologists from Moscow - Petr and Olesya. Olesya is a body-oriented psychotherapist, works with children and adult people. Petr is a software developer, psychologist and a painter. We like to travel more than anything other in this life. This year we went crazy a little bit and decided to participate in Mongol Rally.
Mongol Rally is a crazy annual race on small dumb cars with an engine with size of 1.0L or even less. During this race people go on their old cars through Europe and Asia trying to reach wonderful Mongolia. There are no strict rules and routes in this rally - the main purpose is to reach finish line. This is an adventure. And every team raises some money for charity.

We have a great travel experience - from USA, Austria and Italy to India, Nepal and Myanmar, from gorgeous German highways to several weeks tracks in some forests and mountains with a backpack with all equipment behind our backs. We have visited volcanos in New Zealand, hitchhiked cars in Georgia country and traveled in Nepal on bus roofs. Petr drives a motorbike and has been all around India with his backpack and Olesya has driven her car all around Russia. We decided to use all our travel experience to successfully reach Mongolia in this rally and already bought an old yellow small Daewoo Matiz with 0.8L engine. It is a very small (originally - Korean) car, nowadays it is produced in Uzbekistan. It is very popular in Moscow among pizza delivery service, because it's very simple, small and solid. 
Official rally start is in Prague, 15th of July, the every team goes to Mongolia, finish line is in Ulan-Ude city, Russia. We've got about 2 months to complete the race.
Our team name is "Mama Was Right". You know, mama was right, the world is dangerous all around.


ABOUT MONEY
To make sense for this crazy rally every team raises some money for charity. Recommended amount of money is £1000. We want to raise money with all your kindly help and to spread them in that ways:

first part we will give to social organisation Cool Earth, it is an official charity partner of the rally, so we are planning to give them £500 (about $700)
second part we want to send to one special Moscow school (Saint George School), there are children with autism studying there. Autism is a very complicated condition ofconsciousness and mind, we don't like to call it decease, because this children are not ill, they are..different. And they have a lot of problems with communication with other people. And all their parents go through hard periods of their lives, because it is not so easy to have an autistic kid. This Moscow school doesn't receive sufficient amount of money from government so most of the spendings are on parents of these children. So, any amount of money would be very helpful for them



THE ROUTE AND DATES

(this route is not 100% correct, we are still thinking about some parts, probably we will try to go to Turkmenistan, now we are trying to get visas there)
There is no such a thing as 'the route' in this rally, but our plan is:

10th of July we leave Moscow and go to Prague
15th of July - official start in Prague
then we want to cross these countries - Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Croatia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Montenegro, Serbia, Bulgaria and Turkey.
then we have two choices - enter Georgia, the enter Russia and reach Kazakhstan. Or, after Georgia we could go to Azerbaijan, take a ferry there, cross Caspian Sea  and again reach Kazakhstan. Or - take a ferry from Baku and reach Turkmenbashi city (Turkmenistan)
after Kazakhstan we want to go to Uzbekistan, the Tajikistan, cross Pamir Highway (4655m above the sea!!) to Kyrgyzstan, then go to north - to Kazakhstan and Russia, then finally reach Mongolia, visit Ulan-Bator and finally go north to finish line in Ulan-Ude (Russia).
after all of this adventure we are planning to drive back our car to Moscow

WHAT POSSIBLY COULD GO WRONG
Mm..anything? But this is an adventure and we are not planning to give up in any case. All the way we will make photos and videos about our trip on Instagram and Facebook
Our road Instagram is here: https://www.instagram.com/yourmamawasright
And our Facebook page is here: https://www.facebook.com/mamawasright
 
PERKS / Волшебные подарки
$5 Charity Perk
Эти  волшебные 5 баксов мы отложим на благотворительность. Упомянем тебя в нашем посте в инстаграм, чтобы все знали имя героя.
This glorious 5 dollars  we will send directly to charity. And also we will mention you in our post on Instagram for everybody to know the hero.
 
$5 God Help Us
А эти волшебные 5 баксов мы отложим себе на бензин. Упомянем тебя в нашем посте в инстаграм, чтобы все знали имя героя.
This 5 dollars we'll keep for our gas on a road. And also we will mention you in our post on Instagram for everybody to know the hero.
 
$10 Mongol Postcard
Специально для ралли мы нарисуем тематические монгольские открытки со смыслом и без, напечатаем их и будем отправлять их со всякими пожеланиями из разных точек нашего пути. Не забудь прислать нам свой полный почтовый адрес!
We will draw special Mongolian postcards and send them from different points of our route. Don't forget to write us your full address.

$100 Therapy session in Moscow
ТОЛЬКО ДЛЯ МОСКВЫ. Терапевтическая сессия у Олеси. Мы работаем в парадигме телесно-ориентированного подхода. Если у тебя есть какой-то вопрос, который ты не можешь решить или ты хочешь познакомиться с такими вещами поближе, Олеся может провести для тебя сессию в Москве, а дальше ты уже сам решишь, нужно ли тебе это в жизни или нет.
ONLY FOR MOSCOW. Therapy session with Olesya. We work in body-oriented therapy. If you have some question, that you cannot solve or you just want to understand  what a body therapy is Olesya can make a session for you in Moscow. 
 
$2000 OUR GLORIOUS CAR
ТОЛЬКО ДЛЯ РОССИИ. Отдадим тебе нашу боевую тачку. Ну или то, что от нее останется потом. В общем, это перк для самых смелых. Мы и сами не знаем, что будет в конце пути. Ну и насыпем подарков, вроде открыток, мистического песка из Монголии и прочего. Полный комплект.
ONLY FOR RUSSIA. We will gift you our car after adventure. Or the rest of it. Well, we don't know exactly yet what will gonna happen at the end, so this perk is for brave enough heroes And of course will give other presents like postcards and mystic sand.

story:
Let Us Introduce Ourselves

We come from varied backgrounds: philosophy, fine arts, film, business, tourism, environmental governance, zoology. But now we are all Environmental Visual Communication (EVC) students and we have one goal: to change the public conversation about the environment.

For 7 months we meet at the Royal Ontario Museum to hone our technical savvy and creative visions. We learn how to build a bridge between you and your audience by merging arts with science. We use photography, videography, design, and social media to tell compelling stories about our natural world. We are working towards a graduate certificate from Fleming College’s School of Environmental and Natural Resource Sciences, but what we really want is change. We want to change how the public values science, and how science values storytelling.

We are nearing the end of our program and are about to enter the professional world. While we are confident that we have unique skills to offer, we also know that jobs in visual communication are few and far between. We believe in the power of storytelling and we want to convince professionals in the environmental field that hiring visual communicators will greatly help them to engage the public with their message.

This is why we are speaking at the Latornell Conservation Symposium - to help professionals understand what environmental visual communication is and why they need it and us. We won’t beat around the bush. We want jobs. That is what it comes down to. And we are campaigning to help get us there.


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $3500. This will help to cover our conference registration fees, accommodations, equipment rentals, and any miscellaneous costs such as travel and printing.

To help us get to Latornell you can either back it (pink button up above) or click on the perk that you desire to purchase.

By donating, you are funding change-makers and storytellers. Besides the warm, fuzzy feeling that comes from doing something good for the world, we are also offering some great and unique perks! These include one of a kind artwork by EVC students such as drawings and hand-made polymer clay charms.

We are also happy to offer some amazing perks from the Royal Ontario Museum including a One Year Family Membership and a Behind-the-Scenes Experience for two people. 

And finally, we are excited to be able to offer our skills! For an amazing price, you can get an EVC student to photograph your event. We guarantee you’ll end up with some awesome, professional quality photographs.  

This and more, look over all of our perks in the section below.

Thank you!

 

 

The Impact

Humans have always connected through stories. It’s how we understand ourselves and the world around us, and how we build relationships with each other. Stories explain, communicate, teach, and at their most powerful, inspire.

 

The realms of art and science are often thought of as separate disciplines, but they’re really both about conveying knowledge and meaning. Science appeals to our minds, while stories appeal to our hearts. A beautiful photo will capture attention, but what is it saying? Will it create change and generate discussion? Will it leave a lasting impression? Marketing science leverages the compelling power of storytelling by using communication methods that connect the heart and mind. The tales we read as children instilled in us values like sharing, fairness, and perseverance, and the stories we tell today can inspire us all to value nature and science for the sake of our planet.

Our generation has many environmental issues to tackle; from protecting watersheds, to sustainable resource management, to conserving biodiversity; and the more people that can be encouraged to support these efforts, the more effective they will be. We want professionals in the environmental sector to value storytelling, because storytelling will add value to the important things that they do, and make them matter to a greater audience. The gap that exists between science and the public needs to be addressed. The world needs science, and science needs us.


We hope that everyone will contribute to our campaign, but if you aren’t in the position to donate, please help out by sharing our page on your social media sites. We appreciate every dollar raised and every share posted!

Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @eviscomm #change4eviscomm

story:
Wat is Sociolution? (Dutch)

Sociolution is een concept voor een (In het begin) Nederlandse stichting met het doel Sociologische problematiek concreet aanpakken. Wij willen dit doen door middel van een systeem op de toekomstige website wat constant een concrete en duidelijke uitleg gaat geven per project over wat het inhoudt, met welk doel we het opzetten en waarom we het nodig vinden.

Het eerste project (Wat al bekend is en een cruciale rol voor ons als stichting gaat hebben.) word het zorgen dat er een beter toezicht komt op verscheidene grote socialmedia platformen door een vorm van handhaving af te dwingen. Hiermee hopen we onder andere onnodige voorvallen van pedofiele, chantage met bijvoorbeeld naaktfoto's en mogelijke zelfmoorden te voorkomen. Dit willen we doen door er veel aandacht op te vestigen via media in combinatie met een petitie. Mocht dit niet genoeg zijn dan gaan we over op strenge juridische en politieke maatregelen.

 

Wat is Sociologie?

"Sociologie is de studie van de sociale relaties tussen mensen, en in het bijzonder van de politieke, culturele, religieuze en economische aspecten van menselijke samenlevingen. Daarbij staan vooral de inrichting en veranderingen daarvan, alsmede sociale problemen centraal. Belangrijke vragen zijn hoe sociale cohesie, sociale ongelijkheid en identiteit tot stand komen."

Binnen de stichting praten we echter vooral over "Sociologische problematiek". Dit zijn problemen met specifiek negatieve effecten op de samenleving. (Denk dan bijvoorbeeld vooral aan Racisme, Discriminatie en Psychologische problematiek etc.)

 

Het team:

Het bestuur:

-Initiatiefnemer en Voorzitter: Erik Mirko Gerrits

-Penningmeester: Magda Verheij

Vrijwilligers:

-Marketeer: Menno

-Sociologisch adviseur: Oker

 

Funding:

Ondanks we hopen dat deze campagne ons inderdaad het beoogde bedrag oplevert is het zeker niet zo dat indien dit niet gebeurd het project niet tot realisatie komt. We hebben de campagne op flex staan, wat inhoud dat we alles ophalen wat er gedoneerd word en we dus niet per definitie het doel hoeven te halen. One way or another gaat het project er dus komen! De eerste 500.- zal geïnvesteerd worden in het notarieel vastleggen van de stichting. Alles daarna gaat compleet afhangen van wat op dat moment belangrijk is. Hier nog even kort een compleet overzicht met waar het geld heen gaat indien we het doel halen:

  • 500,- Voor het notarieel vastleggen van de stichting etc.
  • 700,- Voor een juridische zaken etc.
  • 1000,- Voor de website, het logo en de designs voor socialmedia etc.
  • 1500,- Voor de donateurswerving.
  • 1000,- Voor de eerste 2 projecten.
  • 300,- Voor bijzaken.

 

Andere manieren waarop je kan supporten:

Je kan ons project altijd steunen door de campagne te delen op socialmedia en indien je meer wilt dan alleen doneren kan je eventueel in de toekomst vaste donateur te worden!

story:
Saving the World, One Bird, Butterfly, and Bee at a Time

From the tiniest ant to the mighty elephant, every creature on this planet performs its job as Mother Nature intended. I believe it is man's job to appreciate and protect those creatures whose beauty brings joy to every moment, for they have no voice and no way to protect themselves against man's will. I have dedicated myself to doing everything I can to help birds, butterflies, bees, pollinators, and wildlife, both at my Eco.Birder. habitat and with my Facebook page, Eco.Birder.

Monarch butterfly populations are the lowest they have ever been. Songbirds are declining by 60% or more worldwide. Will you help me fight for them? I am reaching out to all those who love nature. Please help me to continue helping them.

Save the Monarchs

All contributors will receive Woodson Swamp Milkweed seeds harvested from my organic habitat. (See photo) Together we CAN make a difference!
